answers.answer: I believe that everything will be fine if you follow your Dr's orders. Stay off of your feet as much as possible, get plenty of rest & water & NO STRESS!! Keep us posted on how the rest of your pregnancy goes. I'll say a prayer for you. Good luck!

I dont know what your religion is but I truely believe in god and I will pray for you... but I also know god will help you and your little one if you pray as well... im only 24 im about 4 months and I am tattooed from head to toe never really believed in a higher power till I had my first daughter she was born with a high white blood cell count and through the hole pregnancy I was the healthiest ive ever been in my whole life... that was that first time I dropped down on my knees and prayed the next day her levels were normal and we were able to take her home... soo good luck sweety and like I said ill put a prayer out for you
I hope everything goes Fiine .. nd thank yuh pls prayers are always needed
Am so sorry for your condition. I wish you the best . Get well soon.
I will be praying for you and your baby!!How did they test for preeclampsia? Do they test urine?I hope you and your baby will be fine! Good luck and best wishes!

question: Ok so I'm almost 25 weeks but my baby showing his only 22 weeks and I hv developed preeclampsia so I'm on bed rest til I hv my unborn ..doctors say its possible that I might hv him early .. should I be worried ?? Do yuh think he will make it ?? I'm scared nd dnt kno what to think ...
title: help
